item.title: @elonmusk: All the BBC does is lie. ICE did not, and has never, "used a child as bait." The child was ABANDONED...
item.description: All the BBC does is lie. ICE did not, and has never, "used a child as bait." The child was ABANDONED. On January 20, ICE conducted a targeted operation to arrest Adrian Alexander Conejo Arias an illegal alien from Ecuador who was RELEASED into the U.S. by the Biden administration. As agents approached the driver Adrian Alexander Conejo Arias, fled on foot â€” abandoning his child. For the childâ€™s safety, one of our ICE officers remained with the child while the other officers apprehended Conejo Arias. Parents can take control of their departure and receive a free flight and $2,600 using the CBP Home app.
